panels.description: Recent application errors for correlation with metrics. LogQL: {service="shell"} | json | level="ERROR"
panels.title: Recent Errors (correlated with metrics)

panels.description: HTTP requests with status codes for debugging metrics anomalies. LogQL: {service="shell"} | json | endpoint!="" | status_code!=""
panels.title: HTTP Request Logs

panels.description: Rate limit violations correlated with rate limit metrics. LogQL: {service="shell"} | json |~ "(?i)(rate limit|too many requests)"
panels.title: Rate Limit Events
Circuit Breaker Failure Rate
panels.description: Rate of failures detected by circuit breakers

panels.title: Circuit Breaker State Changes (5m)
panels.description: Circuit breaker state transitions. High values indicate flapping (service instability)

panels.title: Database Pool Connections In Use
panels.description: Current number of database connections in use vs maximum allowed

panels.title: Database Pool Available Connections
panels.description: Number of idle database connections available in the pool

panels.title: Database Pool Usage Percentage
panels.description: Percentage of database pool connections currently in use. Alert thresholds at 80% (warning) and 95% (critical)
